title: Ensuring the Reliability of a Highly Loaded Vehicle Monitoring and Traffic Control Platform
abstract: The article considers the main approaches to solving problems of modern Enterprise systems working under heavy and constantly increasing load: processing and storage of large data, providing fault tolerance, increasing performance, the cheapest and fastest transition of the product to the state of readiness for real operation. Description of architectural solutions for the system under development, review of potential technologies used and justification of technological stack choice are performed. The process of implementing the distributed monitoring system, as well as the developed functionality is described and demonstrates the results of testing the main operating scenarios.
venue: 2023 Systems of Signals Generating and Processing in the Field of on Board Communications
